titleStmt.title: A treatise of self-denial. By Richard Baxter, pastor of the church at Kederminster
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Robert White, for Nevil Simmons at the Princes Arms in Saint Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Another edition of: Baxter, Richard. A treatise of self-denyall.

Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
